title: Agnes Grey - The shift between paragraphs

content.question: The shift between the first and second paragraphs concerns

choices.label: Mrs. Bloomfield’s view of the narrator’s importance
the narrator’s opinion of Mrs. Bloomfield

content.answer: the narrator’s opinion of Mrs. Bloomfield

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
